price: دوى خو له الله پرته يوازې ښځينه لمانځى او له سركښ شيطانه پرته بل څه نه لمانځي.
arabic: إِن يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَٰثٗا وَإِن يَدۡعُونَ إِلَّا شَيۡطَٰنٗا مَّرِيدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: in yadʿūna min dūnihi illā ināthan wa-in yadʿūna illā shayṭānan marīdan
